summary:
I am a self-motivated and passionate data scientist with broad knowledge and expertise in large data analysis, statistics, machine learning, and deep learning. Have developed and deployed hundreds of models in production, with real-time stream predictions. Extensive experiences with end-to-end data science projects.

I am skilled in Python, Power BI, SQL, R, with a solid background in modeling, machine learning (regression/classification/clustering), and deep learning (CNN, RNN, Tensorflow, Keras, openCV), and extensive experience on big data: e.g. Azure, PySpark, Databricks, Spark SQL,  and real-time streaming. 

Over the past years, I have published 18 papers, 1 book chapter, and 15  conference communications. Additionally, I have been a co-supervisor of 13 Bachelor/Master final projects. In 2018, I have been awarded a ~€1 million grant as a Co-PI in a project regarding multi-omics analysis and mathematic modeling.

profile_positions.description:
Customer Centricity team
Shell Remote Sense project: A smart real-time lubricant condition monitoring service delivering insights for industrial companies to optimize equipment health, lower maintenance costs and increase operational efficiency with IoT sensor data. Time series data analysis, predictive maintenance, anomaly detection, root cause analysis
- Developed and deployed >300 machine learning real time models for customers, will scale up to thousands of models. 
- Converted all models in parallel to improve scalability and save money & time, easy to scale up to thousands of equipment.
- Work in a fast-space Agile environment with daily Scrum meeting, selected as sprint star multiple times
- Daily use GitHub, Azure, Databricks, PySpark, Delta lake, DevOps pipeline, production code

Other projects: Process modeling and optimization, Power BI, Alteryx, Python etc.
- Developed an automated process to generate monthly compliance limits for all controllers for process control technologist, saving ~110,000 €/year
- Created an Alteryx workflow for project costs reporting which automatically runs monthly in multiple sites, saving ~100,000 €/year
- Created automatization of Pernis flare KPIs report for the energy & utility technologist, saving ~30,000 € /year
- Maximizing BDX throughput by minimizing flooding events in ED column, anomaly detection, early warning, and evaluated vendor's solution.

Other activities:
- Hackathon: Microsoft Energy Core AI Hackathon 2020: methane leak detection using satellite imagery, 2nd place, presented on the Energy Core Industry Board meeting.
- Weekly data science news digest on the internal communication platform: data science and AI, latest news, sharpened knowledge, new packages, hackathon, conferences. (together with another colleague, >300 views every week)
- Gave training on data science 101: Python, data science
- Co-ordinated Shell data science interns 2021 (>10 interns)
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
Laohenghe Brewery Co Ltd （remotely）

Business analysis, predictive modeling, Tableau, H2O machine learning, deep learning (side projects)

- Business analysis and predictive modeling: Tableau, visualizations, H2O machine learning

profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
Programming, modeling and simulation, large data analysis

- 6 years of programming and 5 projects on both experimental and modeling work.
- Dynamic flux analysis: network analysis, parameter optimization, simulations. Calculated the actual flow rate, flux distribution, determined the pathway bottlenecks. 
- Unsupervised learning to analyze large time-course omics data (proteomics, pattern, clustering) for data analysis, integration and visualization. 

- Shortcut to the carbon-efficient microbial production of chemical building blocks from lignocellulose derived D-xylose （α-KG compartmentation in S. cerevisiae and approaches to resolve metabolite and flux distributions）
- Metabolic switches from quiescence to growth in synchronized S. cerevisiae.
- Lost in the transition of tps1Δ mutant S. cerevisiae: a flux perspective to an old phenomenon.
profile_positions.title: Researcher, Guest Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Statistics, field experimental design, agriculture, bioinformatics

-  Large genomics sequence analysis (screening, clustering, statistics, function prediction, quantitative genetics)
- Statistics analysis and field experimental design to improve agriculture qualities (quantitative genetics, field statistics, t-test, Analysis of variance (ANOVA))
